0:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1
1:
routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

0:
containers:
- name: main
  env:
    - name: MINIO_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST
      value: minio.default.svc.cluster.local
    - name: MINIO_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT
      value: "9000"
    - name: ML_PIPELINE_SERVICE_HOST
      value: ml-pipeline.kubeflow
    - name: ML_PIPELINE_SERVICE_PORT_HTTP
      value: "8888"
    - name: ML_PIPELINE_SERVICE_PORT_GRPC
      value: "8887"
